DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose evaluate Suicide Assessment Follow-up Engagement : Veteran Emergency Treatment ( SAFE VET ) currently implement 4 VA ED/Urgent Care Units across United States ( Portland VA Medical Center ( VAMC ) , Denver VAMC , Manhattan VAMC , Philadelphia VAMC ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Brief Intervention Reduce Suicide Risk Military Service Members Veterans- Study 1
DOC.detailed_description: Background : In 2009 , novel clinical demonstration project entitle Suicide Assessment Follow-up Engagement : Veteran Emergency Treatment ( SAFE VET ) initiate potential standard care suicidal Veterans receive treatment Veterans Affairs ( VA ) emergency department ( ED ) . SAFE VET design attenuate suicide risk help Veterans manage suicidal thought behavior , adhere prescribe clinical care ; thereby promote resiliency increase capacity cope suicidal state . Objectives : Using quasi-experimental design , aim study compare effectiveness SAFE VET intervention versus enhance usual care ( E-CARE ) following : 1 ) proportion patient attempt suicide within 6 month index emergency department ( ED ) visit ; 2 ) severity suicide ideation within 6 month index ED visit ; 3 ) proportion patient attend > 1 outpatient mental health substance abuse treatment appointment within 30 day follow index ED visit ; 4 ) degree suicide-related cop attend treatment 6 month period . Methodology : Six hundred Veterans , 300 per condition ( SAFE VET E-CARE ) , meet inclusion/exclusion criterion enrol . E-CARE site follow : Long Beach VAMC , Bronx VAMC , Milwaukee VAMC , San Diego VAMC . All subject participate approximately 1-hour long baseline assessment battery ( index ED visit ) phone , contact phone approximately 1 , 3 , 6 month index ED visit complete follow-up measure . Medical record also review determine VA health service usage six-month period study enrollment .
DOC.criteria: Veterans enrol : 1. receive SAFE VET intervention VA SAFE VET EDs treatmentasusual ECARE EDs ; 2. age 18 year old ; 3. identify risk suicide base upon present complaint and/or assessment ED clinician ; 4. able provide 2 contact telephone number track purpose ; 5. able provide home/residential/shelter address participant reside either home , cellular , telephone number participant reach . Veterans enrol : 1. unable read understand English ; 2. unable unwilling give inform consent determine either refer VA ED clinical staff research personnel ( see Mini Quiz ) ; and/or 3. admit VA inpatient psychiatric unit ED .
